alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Grant (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 4:43PM PDT until July 10 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Douglas County in north central Washington... Central Grant County in north central Washington... * Until 530 PM PDT. * At 443 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Lakeview, or 27 miles east of Wenatchee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeview, Soap Lake, Stratford, and Laveview Park. This includes U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 178 and 188. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
